Class Mathematics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.khaledbakhit.api.rslib.calc.Mathematics

  • public class Mathematics
extends java.lang.Object
    Mathematics contains some important functions to measure performance.

    3.1
    Version:
    15/11/2012
    Author:
    Khaled Bakhit
